name: Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles
author: t4me7
summary: Peanut butter snickerdoodles--why not combine the best of both worlds?
ingredients: ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste
2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine peanut butter, 1 cup white sugar, brown sugar, butter, and shortening in a large bowl
Beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Sift flour, cream of tartar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt together in a separate bowl
Gradually add to the egg mixture and mix well
Mix 1/4 cup sugar and 2 teaspoons cinnamon together in a shallow bowl
Roll dough into 1-inch balls, roll in cinnamon-sugar, and place on a baking sheet
Flatten each ball slightly with the bottom of a drinking glass, or by making a criss-cross pattern with the tines of a fork
Bake in the preheated oven until slightly browned, about 8 minutes
Transfer to a wire rack to cool
